definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Bachu mushroom has more adapt to soil nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 巴楚蘑菇对土壤营养条件有很强的适应性。

sentences.english: The adaptability of ground-cover Chrysanthemum group in Hainan is studied.
sentences.chinese: 文章报道了地被菊在海南引种的适应性情况。

sentences.english: The adaptability of red clover was also good.
sentences.chinese: 红三叶的适应性也较好。

sentences.english: This renewal keeps our bones incredibly strong and uniquely adaptable.
sentences.chinese: 这种更新使我们的骨骼异常坚硬，适应性奇强。

sentences.english: Agile information system is the one of re constructivity and fast adaptability.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷信息系统是具有可重构能力的快速适应性系统。

sentences.english: The high adaptation capability of AMD meant that car door panels and sill could also be retained.
sentences.chinese: 由于AMD的高适应性使得轿门和地坎也得以保留。

sentences.english: One's adaptability is positively correlated with his self-consistency and congruency.
sentences.chinese: 自我和谐和大学生适应性显著相关。

sentences.english: YC collector had a strong adaptability for molybdenite of different ores.
sentences.chinese: YC捕收剂对辉钼矿的适应性较强。

sentences.english: Several more rear shock mounting position for better adjustability .
sentences.chinese: 多个后方休克安装位置更好的适应性。

sentences.english: Other animals have a wider tolerance for changes of bodily temperature.
sentences.chinese: 其它动物对体温之变化有更强之适应性。

sentences.english: Copper and copper alloy showed better anticorrosion performance in salt-lake than in seawater.
sentences.chinese: 铜合金在盐湖表现比海水更好的适应性。

sentences.english: The simulation indicates this control strategy has remarkable self-adaptability and robustness character.
sentences.chinese: 仿真证明，该控制策略具有良好的自适应性和鲁棒性。

sentences.english: Best design of grooved drum, good yarn guide and generalized usage.
sentences.chinese: 最佳槽形设计，槽筒具有优良的导纱性能，适应性广。

sentences.english: Much attention has been paid on the suitability and flexibility of the facility in tube distribution.
sentences.chinese: 在管网布局上突出了窑窖滴灌的灵活性与适应性。

sentences.english: NSFC/DFG-Joint programme " Water Resources Management and Adaptation under Rapidly Changing Environmental …"
sentences.chinese: 合作题目“变化环境下的流域水资源管理及适应性”。

definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
